_aChangeLog.text: Added 2 more boats to boats game (making total of 8)
Added monitor for spectating boats and made area around it more open
Made armory door openable for CTs by just coming close to the enterance
Made Simon Says easier to play
Made Letter opener from the back of Guess the word game now activates by damage only (knifing
Deleted missplaced T spawn near Guess the word game
Fixed sound bug with boats game
Added missing texture to wheel of fortune (for some reason it didn't pack)
